entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023
